item.title: Gradient Structure Estimation under Label-Only Oracles via Spectral Sensitivity
item.description: arXiv:2601.14300v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Hard-label black-box settings, where only top-1 predicted labels are observable, pose a fundamentally constrained yet practically important feedback model for understanding model behavior.
